description:
As a user
  I want to test all main site functionality
  So that I can be sure that site works correctly

steps.name: When  User click on HFN login button
And  User click on Login text field and enter 'test.testsson'
And  User click on Password text field and enter 'pt72r=P+=_'
And  User click on login button
Then  User verify that login to the system is successful
